name: Jingle Dreams
description:
You are Alex, a war veteran that often gets nightmares. Terrible nightmares. Help him get through every dream by being fast and precise with that gun.

Play through 16 different levels before facing the Boss and resolve all of Alex's nightmares by beating him.

Go through increasing difficulty as you upgrade your arsenal to match it.

This game was made in the span of ~60 hours for Games Factory Jam 9 - OWGJ 16

It's just the bare bones, I might build upon the idea and polish the game.

Hope you enjoy it!

CONTROLS:

 - Click to shoot

 - That's it

If loading stalls - reload the page (a couple of times?)
